description:
Zoro unleashes a demonic nine sword fighting style on his giraffe opponent, Luffy buys time for Franky by ascending to second gear, and Robin refuses to give up hope of being rescued!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demon God Zoro! An Incarnation of Asura Born from Fighting Spirit
Kishin Zoro! Kihaku ga Miseta Asura no Keshin
Zoro, dieu ou démon ? Vision de l`avatar d`Ashura
Зоро – бог тьмы! Воплощение Асуры, явившего свой дух
الإله الشّيطانيّ زورو! وُلد تجسّد أسورا من الرّوح القتاليّة!
鬼神ゾロ! 気迫が見せた阿修羅の化身
